content.title: AI Knowledge Assistant with RAG

aboutUs.subheader: We’re a team of AI engineers, product strategists, and automation nerds passionate about building agents that actually work. We've helped startups, agencies, and enterprise teams harness AI in ways that are simple, strategic, and impactful.

faq.subheader: Everything you need to go from concept to fully deployed Al agent-done for you, end to end.

content.question: What kinds of problems can a custom AI agent solve?
content.answer: AI agents can handle everything from answering customer inquiries, managing internal workflows, extracting insights from documents, to automating tasks across apps like Slack, CRMs, and databases. If it’s repetitive, time-consuming, or data-driven—an agent can likely help.

content.question: How long does the process take?
content.answer: Most clients go from strategy to launch in 10–14 business days.

content.question: Do I need to know anything about AI?
content.answer: Nope. We handle all the technical work—just tell us what you want the agent to do.

content.question: What kind of tools can it integrate with?
content.answer: Slack, Notion, Google Workspace, CRMs, Zapier, APIs, internal databases—you name it.

content.question: Can the AI use our internal data?
content.answer: Yes. We use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to let your agent access and reason over your internal documents, knowledge bases, and systems—securely and with up-to-date context.
